@twentyforty what are you using for compression?

@ijaved: libx264 for video compression and neroaacenc for audio. All software have been either written, compiled or heavily modified by myself. 
It is second time today that I've been asked, so:

To people, I recommend MEGui or HandBrake, or mencoder/mp4box/avisynth. These software masterpieces are for free, written and maintained by enthusiasts programmers.

99.9% of other software is just a rip-of of the work these guys have been doing for years and for free.
